login: SELECT * FROM public.user u JOIN user_profile up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE username = $1
insertPerson: INSERT INTO person (document_type, document_number, first_name,  last_name, email, phone, address ) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7) RETURNING person_id
insertUser: INSERT INTO public.user (username, password, person_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)  RETURNING user_id
getPermissions: SELECT p.profile_id, m.method_na, o.object_na FROM public.permission_method pm JOIN public.profile p ON pm.profile_id = p.profile_id JOIN method m ON pm.method_id = m.method_id JOIN object o ON m.object_id = o.object_id
getPersonByDocument: SELECT person_na, person_lna FROM person p JOIN document d ON p.document_id = d.document_id WHERE d.document_nu = $1 LIMIT 1
createAppointment: insert into appointment (appointment_hr, appointment_dt, person_id, department_id) values ($1, $2, $3, $4)
